Name: RDRTMissionsSummary
Title: RDRT: Navigating Missions
Body:
Missions Summary

The Missions Summary page provides an overview of all RDRT missions registered in the RMS database. To open the Missions Summary, choose "Missions" from the RDRT menu at the top:

If you already are in the RDRT module, you can also choose "Missions" in the left menu:

Finding Missions

You can find a particular mission in the list by using filters:

Click the pencil in the Mission row to open the Mission Profile.

Mission Profile

The Mission Profile page provides access to the details of a mission, including:

  • Basic Mission Information
  • Alerts
  • Responses to Alert Messages
  • Member Deployments
  • Mission Documents
